UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Designing Antibacterial Peptides with Enhanced Killing Kinetics.
Literature.Author: Waghu FH, Joseph S, Ghawali S, Martis EA, Madan T, Venkatesh KV, Idicula-Thomas S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=3.125-6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=3.125-6.25µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=3.125-6.25µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25-50µM)
